MaxGreen MG-LI-EAP-650VA 650VA Offline UPS

MaxGreen MG-LI-EAP-650VA Offline UPS comes with 220Vac Input Voltage, 140-290VAC Input Voltage Range, 50 Hz Frequency, 220Vac Output Voltage. This offline UPS, It also features with ±10% (Bat Mode) AC Voltage Regulation, 50Hz ± 1Hz (Bat Mode) Frequency Range, and a 2-6ms Transfer time Typically that provides you good performance. The MaxGreen MG-LI-EAP-650VA Offline UPS also has Waveform Simulated Sine Wave (Bat Mode), Battery Internal maintenance-free lead-acid (Battery Type & Number 12V/9Ah*1). This UPS provides 4-6 hours recover time to 90% capacity, Full protection Short circuit, Overload, Battery discharge and overcharge, Surge protection. This UPS also has Humidity 0-90% Relative Humidity 0-40 ƒ (Non-condensing) and Noise Level of Less than 40dB. The MaxGreen MG-LI-EAP-650VA Offline UPS comes with 01 year warranty.
